fitness.locopt: Default Built-In optimizer using both energy and gradient information for minimzation. Requires a generic backend that fits the problem to be optimized (e.g. the Cartesian backend for atoms/molecules). The fitness is the minimized value returned from this Cartesian backend. <GENERIC BACKEND> 100 2

Built-In optimizer using only gradient information. Requires a generic backend that fits the problem to be optimized (e.g. the Cartesian backend for atoms/molecules). The fitness is the minimized value returned from this Cartesian backend. <GENERIC BACKEND> 100
fitness.generic: Generic Backend for Cartesian Problems (e.g. Molecules and Atoms). Requires a calculator backend to be able to provide energies and gradients. <CALCULATOR BACKEND>
fitness.calculator: Very basic universal Force Field that automatically determines atom types.
